abstracts.cdata!:
This report summarizes progress in the
            execution of the reform program and actions taken by the
            Government of the Republic of Tajikistan to meet the
            specific conditions for the release of the second tranche.
            The report concludes that the conditions for the release of
            the second tranche have been met.
